# scrollColumnToVisible(_:)

**Instance Method**

Scrolls the view so the specified column is visible.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func scrollColumnToVisible(_ column: Int)
```

## Parameters

- **column**: The index of the column in the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSTableView/tableColumns] array.

## Related Documentation

- **scroll(to:)**: Changes the origin of the clip view’s bounds rectangle to `newOrigin`.

## Scrolling

- **scrollRowToVisible(_:)**: Scrolls the view so the specified row is visible.
